pageProduct.name: Wagner Professional Ferro Plus C 30 Modified Release Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Sustained release to maximise and with Vitamin C  enhance the absorption of iron and to minimise and reduce unwanted side effects such as stomach discomsfort , heartburn and constipation.

Warnings

Warning: do not take this medicine longer than 12 months except on medical advice.  Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active ingredients has ferrous sulfate and ascorbic acid which enhances and facilitates the absortion of iron in the small intestine. The addition of vitamin C makes the absorption of iron more efficinet and so helps tto reduce the sypotms of tiredmness , fatigue and lack of energy much sooner leading to a speedier recovery and decreasing the length of time you need to take the medicine.

Directions

Take one tablet daily whole or as directed by physician, do not break, crush or chew.
